subject: clang slavish
body:
Successful candidate must have leadership skills, be computer literate,
and have well developed interpersonal skills, both written and
verbal.
Elaborate on any experience with cement, power or process
industries.
A Professional registration or Masters degree is highly desirable.
If so, where and when?
To be considered you must have excellent communication skills, be
self-motivated, goal-oriented and able to work both independently and as
part of a team.
